_sText:
UPDATE fy_basefight_beta_v3

Some important bugs are fixed the terror freeze bug is gone 
And also the inviled counter terrorist is fixed.
Now servers can run the map normall 

The spawnkilling is half fixed but I need to find a better way.
wooden blocks are made on the second floor.

Credits go to [NiTro]-Panda

http://www.nitro-clan.fjx.nl

UPDATE fy_basefight_beta_v2

In this update the are some new things and some things that are made better.

First i made the floor of glass all the walls the same collor,
The stone blocks are changed to wooden boxes and the is more light.
the teleport is made better so you can go from the first to the second floor and back
but the vending machine is removed so now you must find the teleport 
(its  the second block left from the ct spawn.)
On the second floor you see a halflive spray so you can teleport back to the first floor.

In the map i made a kind of little house where are 3 blocks with switches 
the left one with the blue dot is to turn the light of at the CT base, 
The middle block with switch is to turn of the light off at the arena, 
And the right one with the red marking is for turning off the light at the T base. 
If a switch is activated the block with the switch will go into the wall for a 
couple of seconds, then the block returns back from the wall and you can use it again. 
Also the Ct and T base has
breakable glas, En on the second floor unbreakleble glass.

Credits go to [NiTro]-Panda

http://www.nitro-clan.fjx.nl
